basic.description:
Continuation of MUSC 120/6.0. 
NOTE    Students who do not hold the prerequisite may audition for admission to this course.  They must obtain a grade of A- in the jury examination component of MUSC 121/6.0 or MUSC 124/6.0 and receive recommendation of the jury.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Applied Study II (Performance)
